experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: • Built and implemented an automated demand forecasting engine for FMCG products, streamlining the data science workflow by automating feature generation, data transformation, and model building. Achieved a 33% reduction in runtime, enhancing operational efficiency. Demonstrated a remarkable 20% improvement in forecasting accuracy.• Engineered a range-based forecasting model utilizing residual bootstrapping techniques to mitigate bias, resulting in enhanced forecast accuracy.• Contributed to developing key tools, including a classification engine for seamless model development, training, and testing; an EDA app enabling code-free exploratory data analysis with exportable reports; and a cookie-cutter setup to streamline processes for the data science team.• Designed and implemented a multi-functional audio analysis tool with Azure services & OpenAI´s LLM models, including features for speech-to-text transcription, language translation, audio summarization, sentiment analysis, and a chatbot for interactive engagement with audio content.• Build an Agentic Text-to-SQL tool using LangGraph and. Azure OpenAI to enable seamless data retrieval from Snowflake for direct access.• Developed multiple Streamlit dashboards to facilitate model delivery to end users, ensuring efficient monitoring and eliminating dependencies on Excel.• Led data cleaning and exploratory data analysis initiatives, specializing in classical time series models such as ARIMA, SARIMA, and Prophet. Also, I proficiently worked with machine learning and deep learning algorithms, including Random Forest, XGBoost, LightGBM, Neural Prophet, and LSTM.
experience.description_html: • Built and implemented an automated demand forecasting engine for FMCG products, streamlining the data science workflow by automating feature generation, data transformation, and model building. Achieved a 33% reduction in runtime, enhancing operational efficiency. Demonstrated a remarkable 20% improvement in forecasting accuracy.• Engineered a range-based forecasting model utilizing residual bootstrapping techniques to mitigate bias, resulting in enhanced forecast accuracy.• Contributed to developing key tools, including a classification engine for seamless model development, training, and testing; an EDA app enabling code-free exploratory data analysis with exportable reports; and a cookie-cutter setup to streamline processes for the data science team.• Designed and implemented a multi-functional audio analysis tool with Azure services & OpenAI´s LLM models, including features for speech-to-text transcription, language translation, audio summarization, sentiment analysis, and a chatbot for interactive engagement with audio content.• Build an Agentic Text-to-SQL tool using LangGraph and. Azure OpenAI to enable seamless data retrieval from Snowflake for direct access.• Developed multiple Streamlit dashboards to facilitate model delivery to end users, ensuring efficient monitoring and eliminating dependencies on Excel.• Led data cleaning and exploratory data analysis initiatives, specializing in classical time series models such as ARIMA, SARIMA, and Prophet. Also, I proficiently worked with machine learning and deep learning algorithms, including Random Forest, XGBoost, LightGBM, Neural Prophet, and LSTM.

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: • Worked on digital signals, filtering, analyzing, and preparing the data. Applied various statistical methods to generate insights and model the signals.• Setup an end-to-end automated architecture for the organization for processing and loading the data into the data warehouse for analytics purposes. Also, set up analytical infrastructure for delivering the analytics using PowerBI. • Worked with various teams i.e. Data Science, Product, Sales, Finance, and Marketing to understand and deliver their analytics requirements.• Perform data visualization for time series data using Seaborn and Matplotlib. And also explicitly worked on Pandas, Numpy, Bigquery, Linux, and Google Console.
experience.description_html: • Worked on digital signals, filtering, analyzing, and preparing the data. Applied various statistical methods to generate insights and model the signals.• Setup an end-to-end automated architecture for the organization for processing and loading the data into the data warehouse for analytics purposes. Also, set up analytical infrastructure for delivering the analytics using PowerBI. • Worked with various teams i.e. Data Science, Product, Sales, Finance, and Marketing to understand and deliver their analytics requirements.• Perform data visualization for time series data using Seaborn and Matplotlib. And also explicitly worked on Pandas, Numpy, Bigquery, Linux, and Google Console.

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: • Built deep learning models for computer vision project using thePytorch framework for recognizing text from the images • Worked with transfer learning technique and used pre-trainedmodels like Resnet, Efficientnet, Nfnets, and Attention models• Extract business keywords from articles using collocations and theRAKE algorithm• Performed data collection, preprocessing, and labeling. Improverunning time of the python scripts to enhance the efficiency of theprograms

projects: [{"title":"Dog Breed Image Predication","start_date":"Jun 2021","end_date":"Jun 2021","description":"An end-to-end project to identify the 10 different types of dog breeds. Deployment link of the project: https://dog-breed-prediction-01.herokuapp.com/Tool Used: Pytorch, Fast-API, Jupyter Notebook, Python, Matplotlib, Pandas, Numpy"},{"title":"Fine Grained Sentiment Prediction For Mobile Reviews","start_date":"Oct 2020","end_date":"Oct 2020","description":"Perform fine-grained sentiment prediction on mobile reviews. The task is to scrap the mobile phone reviews from amazon and perform to predict sentiment for them. The machine learning model is trained for the Stanford Sentiment Tree dataset."},{"title":"Bitcoin Price Forecasting","start_date":"Sep 2020","end_date":"Oct 2020","description":"The project is related to time series analysis. We used various several time series models to test various hypotheses on Bitcoin price movements and try to relate it with various fluctuations in the Stock market and see how it is affected. We have considered SP500, Oil Prices, Gold Prices, and finding how these three and Bitcoin prices are correlated. Also, how their volatilities affect others. The goal of this project is to come up with a conclusion that will help in Bitcoin's price prediction."},{},{},{"title":"Fake Job Description Prediction","start_date":"Mar 2020","end_date":"May 2020","description":"This is a data science project and problem is to identify given job description is fraudulent or not. The dataset is taken from Kaggel and it consists meta-information about 18K job descriptions. We deal with numerical and text features in this project. The project consists of data preprocessing, data analysis, feature engineering, handling imbalanced dataset and hyperparameter tuning."},{}]
